examples.translation: 有三人被当做嫌疑犯拘留。
恶劣的天气耽搁了我们几个小时。
检疫期，隔离期当运输工具、人或材料被怀疑带有传染性疾病，被扣留在港口进行强行隔离的一段期限，以防止疾病传入某个国家
examples.first: A period of time during which a vehicle, person, or material suspected of carrying a contagious disease is
examples.last: at a port of entry under enforced isolation to prevent disease from entering a country.

v: deprive of freedom; take into confinement
cause to be slowed down or delayed
